Title: Improper Restriction of Excessive Authentication Attempts
Description: Brute Force Protection Bypass in backend login.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 6.2.0 before 6.2.14, all versions starting from 7.0.0 before 7.3.0
NotImpacted: All versions before 6.2.0, all versions starting from 6.2.14 before 7.0.0, all versions starting from 7.3.0
